scripts.watch: npm run build && babel src -d dist --copy-files -w
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && babel src -d dist --copy-files && ln -s ../node_modules dist/ && ln -s ../package.json ./dist/
scripts.copy-ffmpeg: rm -rf dist/ffmpeg && mkdir dist/ffmpeg && cp ffmpeg-tmp/binaries/${PLATFORM}_${ARCH}/* dist/ffmpeg
scripts.package-single: npm run copy-ffmpeg && electron-packager dist LosslessCut --out=package --asar.unpackDir=ffmpeg --overwrite --platform=${PLATFORM} --arch=${ARCH} --icon=icon-dist/${ICON}
scripts.package:darwin_x64: PLATFORM=darwin ARCH=x64 ICON=app.icns npm run package-single
scripts.package:win32_ia32: PLATFORM=win32 ARCH=ia32 ICON=app.ico npm run package-single
scripts.package:win32_x64: PLATFORM=win32 ARCH=x64 ICON=app.ico npm run package-single
scripts.package:linux_ia32: PLATFORM=linux ARCH=ia32 ICON=app.ico npm run package-single
scripts.package:linux_x64: PLATFORM=linux ARCH=x64 ICON=app.ico npm run package-single
scripts.zip: (cd package && rm -f LosslessCut-*.zip && for f in LosslessCut-*; do zip -r --symlinks "$f".zip "$f"; done)
scripts.package: npm run package:darwin_x64 && npm run package:win32_ia32 && npm run package:win32_x64 && npm run package:linux_ia32 && npm run package:linux_x64 && npm run zip
